events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to know how to get a refund or an exchange as soon as possible.
System has flagged the issue as a refund request because the customer mentioned money back and exchange.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request.
Hello! Sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I’m here to help you with the refund or exchange process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and I have attached a picture showing the item I got is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund immediately and provide a prepaid return shipping label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for resolving this so quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund and return instructions.
The refund has been processed and return shipping label sent. Let us know if there’s anything else we can assist with.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if the return process went smoothly.
Since everything is resolved, we are closing this case. Thanks for contacting support and have a great day!
We’ve sent a short survey to hear about your experience with our refund process. Your feedback is important to us.
